verse: यं प्रव्रजन्तमनुपेतमपेत कृत्यं द्वैपायनो विरह कातर आजुहाव । पुत्रेति तन्मयतया तरवोऽभिनेदु: तं सर्वभूतह्र्दयं मुनिमानतोस्मि
overall_meaning: I am one who, distressed by the separation, called out to Vyasa, who had wandered without his duties, as if he were my son. I sought shelter in him, the sage who is the heart of all beings, with respect.
